Description:
Welcome Home - Henley Masterpiece!
Perfectly positioned in Bridges Estate, imagine your dreams coming alive in this house that proves to be a spectacular starter package for creating lasting memories.
This newly built Henley home demonstrates a visual treat with 2 well designed open plan living areas, 4 spacious bedrooms including Master with ensuite & walk-in robe.
The spacious well-appointed kitchen consists of grand Caesar stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel stand-alone oven, ample cupboard space plus a large walk in pantry. This home also boasts a great sized laundry, central bathroom & remote entry double car garage.
This modern home has a beautiful combination of comfort & space, combined with natural light to all rooms that is sure to catch the attention of the fussiest of home occupiers or investors.
PLEASE NOTE: Photos are for illustration purposes only.
Insights: 5 Delaware Road, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Sold By Gordon Garg & Robbie Sandhu
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this conveniently positioned house with close proximity to Craigieburn Train Station, Craigieburn Primary and Secondary Schools. If you are considering buying your first home or simply looking for an investment with easy access to the best of Craigieburn, then don't miss out on this one.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 2 Spacious Bedrooms
- BATHROOM: Stylish bathroom with top of the range tiles.
- KITCHEN: Spacious Open Plan Living/ Dining Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances, Dishwasher and stone bench tops.
- HEAT/COOL: Ducted Heating and Refrigerated Cooling.
- LAUNDRY: European style Laundry.
- BACKYARD: Beautiful easy to maintain Backyard
- GARAGE: Single garage with remote control access
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Concreted Car Space, Fencing, Linen Cabinets and much more.
SCHOOLS:
-Craigieburn Primary School
-Craigieburn Secondary School
- Roxburgh Rise Primary School
-Willmot Park Primary School
- LOCATION:
Close proximity to Kinder Garden, Football Ground and Craigieburn Train Station. Near Distance to Our Lady Primary School, Willmott Primary School, Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Junction, Craigieburn Golf Course Supermarkets, Gym, Splash Aqua Park, Leisure Centre. Easy access to bus stops, beautiful parklands, Child Cares, Service Stations, Restaurants/CafÃ© and Hume Freeway.
Benefits:
ï Low Maintaince House
ï Very Close to Craigieburn Train Station
ï Walking Distance to Primary and Secondary School
ï Live in the Heart of Craigieburn with close proximity to all major amenities.
Don't let this opportunity pass you buy. Call Gordon Garg on 0433 897 397 or Robbie Sandhu on 0466 074 580 to book your inspection!!!
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only and all photos are for illustration purposes only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.

Description:
Build your Dream Home on 512m2..
Welcome to this beautiful piece of land in the heart of well sought after Mt Aitken Estate! With close proximity to all the prime amenities at your doorsteps make this land your own to create your masterpiece on a blank canvass. Titled and ready to build this 512m2 (approx.) premium block won't last long so enquire today and make it your own!!!
Land Features
• Minute's drive to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre
• Aqua Splash Swimming Centre
• Close proximity to all the Primary and Secondary Schools
• Pelican Child care centre across the road
• Easy access to Mt Aitken Rd.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
A touch of luxury
In an area renowned for its exceptional lifestyle benefits this impressive home sets a new benchmark in quality, design and sophistication. Only moments away from expansive parks, waterways and walking paths, it offers four bedrooms, two designer bathrooms and a relaxing alfresco to deliver luxurious and enviable contemporary living.
Open plan family room adjoining meals area and kitchen with stone benchtop, S.S.A and pantry
Expansive master bedroom with en-suite and W.I.R Luxury fittings and fixtures including ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, alarm and high ceilings
Single remote garage with internal and external access
Landscaped Gardens complementing a spacious alfresco area and courtyard
Located in a quiet street within minutes of everything Craigieburn has to offer, this free standing residence offers the ultimate indoor and outdoor family experience.

Description:
Proudly Presented With Location To Match...
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Under 3 years old and comprising of ducted heating & evaporative cooling, large open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & walk in pantry overlooking the meals area, formal lounge, master bedroom with walk in robe & double vanity to ensuite, remote control double lock up garage with internal access plus much more. Step outside and the home is complete with low maintenance landscaped gardens. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Approximately 659sqm of Untapped Potential!
A rare find, this oversized allotment (approx 659m2) presents an outstanding opportunity for
those looking to build their brand-new dream home - or possibly sub-divide (STCA) - in an
established Craigieburn neighbourhood with enviable urban convenience.
Surrounded by family homes, key attributes of the property include an impressively wide
frontage (approx 16.8m), uniform dimensions, minimal gradient as well as general residential
zoning (GRZ1).
Enjoy every lifestyle advantage this central location has to offer including close proximity to local parks and Malcolm Creek trails, Craigieburn Station, primary & secondary schools, choice of shopping centres, as well as easy access to the Hume Freeway.
A unique occasion to secure one of the last remaining unbuilt blocks in the area - don't miss this one!

Description:
First Home Buyers and Investors Put Your Hands Up!
LJ Hooker is proud to present 7 Champion Parade Craigieburn. Positioned in the ever popular Aston Estate, this property is ideal for those looking for their first home, adding to their investment portfolio or looking for a change in lifestyle.
The ground floor showcases a formal lounge upon entry, light filled open living, dining and kitchen area featuring stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space.
Continue upstairs and be welcomed by three generous sized bedrooms with built in robes serviced by a main bathroom with bath and study nook.
Fantastic extras include ducted heating, split system cooling, single car garage, downstairs powder room and outdoor space.
Located close to Craigieburn Central, Splash Aquatic Centre, Craigieburn Junction, public transport and much more dont miss out on this opportunity.

Description:
Picture Perfect, Warm & Welcoming
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
The home's beautifully appointed interior boasts a large master bedroom fitted with walk in robe & deluxe ensuite, three additional good size bedrooms all with built in robes, stunning main bathroom and the perfect formal lounge.
Other luxuries include oversized kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & large pantry overlooking the dining/living room, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, alarm system, high ceilings, double remote car garage with internal & drive through access & low maintenance gardens with garden shed.
An aspirational family lifestyle located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & premium streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, Stockland shopping centre, public transport and local schools. This home really is the complete package, be quick to inspect as it won't hang around for long!

Description:
A HOME, A RESTAURANT & A WORKSHOP ON 704m2
A contemporary design that exudes style and encourages togetherness, this showpiece residence is one you can't help falling in love with. From its scintillating entertaining zones to extensive workshop area and large backyard, 9 Highbury Circuit is a one that will seriously impress.
Reflecting the needs of the modern family, this special home boasts attractive colour schemes and fabulous décor throughout the living space to create a wow factor never experienced before.
With stone bench tops, ample cupboard space, pendant lighting and 900m appliances, the deluxe kitchen will delight all cooking enthusiasts and is a hint of what is yet to come.
A sense of space and openness flows throughout the light filled meals area and casual living room.
Highlighting the very best in outdoor living, the Wood Fire oven and an Argentinian Parilla Grill complements the extensive decking and fire pit lounge to add a new meaning to alfresco dining The fully irrigated Vegie garden supported by 10,000 litre water tank encourages a
healthy lifestyle
whilst the chicken coup gives further meaning to the term organic living.
Bedroom accommodation boasts of a luxurious master with double vanity ensuite, fully equipped walk in robe and allows access out onto the private alfresco, whilst remaining sleeping quarters exudes comfort and easily caters for all the families storage needs.
Just when you thought the home couldnt get any better you will discover a 12m x 4m approx. workshop/carport (mancave) joined to the rear of garage, giving
the option to securely park 4 cars undercover whilst the drive through allows additional room for trailers, cars and boats. Completed with its own storage area, range hood and sink, there are endless possibilities to utilise this fabulous zone.
Boasting ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum system, built in speakers, 8 security cameras and much more. Located only minutes from Mount Ridley College, Craigieburn Primary School, Craigieburn Central and Hume Anglican Grammar. This stunning home will certainly capture the hearts of all who inspect!
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
Insights: 9 Highbury Circuit, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Ultimate Family Entertainer with the Best Views in Town
Aspirational family living, this remarkable residence is sure to make a lasting impression with its wonderfully versatile floorplan, sensational indoor/outdoor entertaining areas & uninterrupted panorama from the city to the mountains.
Surrounded by established gardens on approx 719m2 of land, the home's beautifully-appointed
interior showcases an extra-large master bedroom with walk-in robe & spa ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes), stylish main bathroom (also with spa) & guest powder room.
High ceilings throughout, the home also boasts a dedicated theatre room with tiered flooring & expansive open-plan living/dining area with gas-stone fireplace, views from every window & bi-folds to al-fresco entertaining patio. Add to this a superb kitchen complete with stone benchtops & splashbacks, quality cooking appliances and dishwasher, ample cupboard space & walk-in pantry.
Ducted heating & evaporative cooling provide all-seasons comfort, along with a comprehensive security system (alarm, CCTV & video intercom), plus ducted vacuum, solid hardwood floors, solar power, double blinds all-round, large laundry, excellent storage, balcony (from the master bedroom) & remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Step outside to discover a large resort-style backyard featuring a solar-heated pool with
waterfall, paved surrounds and poolside gazebo, along with an additional al-fresco entertaining deck & high hedges all-round for added privacy. A short stroll to the open spaces of Mount Ridley Conservation Reserve, it's also close to Mother Teresa Catholic Primary School & Hume Anglican Grammar, as well as easy access to the Hume Freeway & choice of shopping centres.
Insights: 4 Regal Rise, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Flexibility with Exceptional Urban Convenience
A terrific lifestyle opportunity for growing families, this 5 bedroom single-level home is sure to make an impression with its versatile floorplan, spacious surrounds (approx 643sqm) & immediate access to a range of attractions & amenities.
Well-presented interior comprises a master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 4 additional double bedrooms, main family bathroom & separate WC. Formal & informal living zones include a large lounge & dining area leading through to the expansive family/meals area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with ample cupboard space, modern stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other features of this spacious home include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, family-
sized laundry & security shutters all-round, plus a large undercover entertaining area, wide
backyard & rear access into the remote-control double garage.
Bus stop out front & local shops across the road, it's walking distance to primary & secondary schools, Aitken Creek trails & parkland, also close to Craigieburn Station, Hume
Freeway & choice of shopping centres.

Description:
Feature-Packed Easy-Living Excellence
Situated in one of Craigieburn's most attractive tree-lined streets, this freestanding home
delivers a fully-optioned lifestyle of quality, privacy & convenience - ideal for first-time buyers, young families & downsizers alike! Picture-perfect from start to finish, the home's impeccable interior comprises 3 bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe & ensuite), dedicated study area & stylish main bathroom.
Add to this a light-filled open living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher. Ducted heating & split-system air-conditioning, full-size laundry, motorised security shutters & 2kW solar power system all add to the appeal, along with an al-fresco style entertaining area with cafe blinds, north-facing backyard & handy storage sheds, plus remote-control garage with internal entry.
A short stroll to Newbury Boulevard buses & Brummel Street Park, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails, primary & secondary schools, Highlands & Craigieburn Central shopping centres.

Description:
SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437
**SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437**Dynamic dual level spaces and desirable outdoor dimensions are beautifully combined by this inviting residence, a Highlands Estate address of exceptional quality and evident class offering stylish, separatly zoned living and dining spaces served by a central open-plan kitchen with stone surfaces, meals island and a full suite of stainless steel appliances. 2 spacious upstairs bedrooms including a main bedroom with a generous balcony share an elegant semi ensuite bathroom and a refined retreat/second living space that completes an impressive contemporary town home. Freshly painted, featuring, a large European laundry, heating/cooling, private courtyard entertaining and a secure rear carport. Only moments from Highlands Shopping Centre, Mount Ridley College, primary schools and parks - appreciate a property where luxury meets low-maintenance, comfort meets convenience and lifestyle attractions lie in every direction.
My Agent Real Estate, a boutique agency offering a high level of service and innovative Real Estate practices to our clients right across Melbourne. Contact Adriano on 0402 055 437, or visit our web site www.myagentre.com.au where you can see all our listings and apply for our properties on line.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Quality, Class & Easy-Living Excellence
Set well back from the street in a boutique modern complex, this 2-storey townhouse is set to impress with its free-flowing design, quality features throughout & enviably convenient
Highlands location.
Filled with northerly light, the home's stylish interior boasts 3 bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe & private ensuite), main bathroom & additional powder room (3rd WC). Add to this a versatile study area (upstairs) & expansive open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other highlights include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, full-size laundry plus a north-facing courtyard & double garage (remote-control) with internal entry. A short stroll to Aitken Creek Primary School & public transport (buses on Waterview Boulevard), it's also
close to Highlands Lake & Malcolm Creek Linear Park, kinder/childcare services, Mount
Ridley College & Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.
Insights: 1/254 Waterview Boulevard, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Style & Quality
Immaculate presentation & style are just some of the key features this home has to offer. Superbly designed for family living with a flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. From the moment you step inside you will be impressed what this family home has to offer. Comprising of ducted heating & evaporative cooling, LARGE open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/family area, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite with double vanity, oversized shower and stone bench tops, study/kids retreat, quality window furnishings, main bathroom, remote control double lock up garage with internal access, laundry packed with storage plus much more. Surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Stockland shopping centre, public transport & schools. You be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!
Insights: 52 Millicent Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
A home full of comfort & room for the toys
This functional family home is the full package offering a generous sized block with a wide frontage and side access perfect for boats, trailers and caravans. Offering quality fittings and features throughout and located in one of the best pockets Craigieburn has to offer.
With great street appeal the modern facade invites you to a smart 4 bedroom home offering multiple living areas perfect for the whole family. All bedrooms are fitted with built in robes, the master suite with walk in robe and full ensuite with double vanity.
This complete family package is finished with a spacious living room which opens on to an undercover entertainment area. The large backyard is the ideal place for kids to run wild whilst the blocks extra wide frontage delivers the ability for recreational vehicles to access side yard and adds scope for more garaging or storage.
The long list of other features include double remote garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and much more.
Located in a quiet family friendly pocket with parklands, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central, Splash Aquatic Centre, multiple Primary Schools and childcares all within a close proximity.
This is a rare opportunity to secure a perfect family home! Don't miss out!
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
Insights: 32 Grevillea Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
